ref: 7780 padrá m. ʻ village, road in a village ʼ lex. [← Drav. cf. Kur. padda ʻ village ʼ? -- Whether or not connected with pallī1 (also ← Drav.), scarcely, with EWA ii 236, hyper -- sanskritism for this, since NIA. forms attest early padra -- ]
Pk. padda -- n. ʻ site of a village, small village ʼ;
B. pāṛā ʻ quarter of a village ʼ;
Or. paṛā ʻ quarter of a town or village, village ʼ;
H. pāṛā m. ʻ quarter of a town ʼ;
G. pādar n. ʻ gate of a village, confines of a village, uncultivated land near a village ʼ.
